job_description: COOP QA ANALYSTClevest transformed mobile workforces for utilities with its leading automation software. We’ve launched mobile applications and platforms that are easy to use so that utilities can scale their workforce in the field and leverage the latest technologies in their day to day work.We foster a collaborative work environment and a positive, supportive culture. We have been recognized by BC Business Magazine as one of the top companies in BC to work for in the digital technology and technological services category and the fastest growing company in BC, among our other awards.POSITIONWe are looking for an 8-month co-op to join Clevest from May – December, 2015.LocationBased at the Clevest head office in Richmond, BC
job_requirements: Responsibilities and specific accountabilities• Identify software anomalies• Write and execute test cases and update and modify them as necessary• Create detailed bug reports that allow Development to easily understand and correct the issue• Maintain accurate records on all tests performed and related results• Work with development to troubleshoot issues• Provide project status to QA Lead• Provides timely status updates to supervisor for all assigned tasks• Performs additional tasks as specified by supervisorOpen To All Majors:No
